objects.description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) has distributed [NotPetya](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0368) by compromising the legitimate Ukrainian accounting software M.E.Doc and replacing a legitimate software update with a malicious one.(Citation: Secureworks NotPetya June 2017)(Citation: ESET Telebots June 2017)(Citation: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020)
